names.bio: Stanley Blystone was born on August 1, 1894 in Eau Claire, Wisconsin, USA as William Stanley Blystone. He was an actor, known for Modern Times (1936), Spook Louder (1943) and Half Shot Shooters (1936). He was married to Alma Tell. He died on July 16, 1956 in Hollywood, California, USA.
names.name: Stanley Blystone
